verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus, be the Centre,
Be my Source, be my Light,
Jesus.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus, be the Centre,
Be my hope, be my song,
Jesus.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus, be my vision,
Be my path, be my guide,
Jesus.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Be the fire in my heart,
Be the wind in these sails;
Be the reason that I live,
Jesus, Jesus.
